title: The Barstool Fund, Serena Ventures
itunes:title: The Barstool Fund, Serena Ventures
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch speak with Barstool Sports CEO Erika Nardini about the expansion of its Barstool Fund, which raised $41 million during the Covid-19 pandemic, the expansion of Barstool Sportsbook, and the challenges of being a high-ranking female executive in sports. Plus, women's tennis G.O.A.T. and Serena Ventures Managing Partner Serena Williams talks to Bloomberg about the new $111 million dollar fund focusing on diverse founders. All that and more on this weekend edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
